title: Mobile Microlearning for Evidence-Based Decision-Making Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic statistical analysis and interpretation of operational data
context.additional_context: Mathematics-based decision-making case analysis-centered education in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more evidence-based decision-making frameworks utilizing operational data
Learners can determine statistical significance in the provided dataset with over 80% accuracy
Learners complete microlearning modules of 5-minute duration in mobile environments with over 90% completion rates
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
